---
title: "Microbiota Analysis"
author: Sudarshan A. Shetty
date: "2023-01-06"
format:
  html:
    code-tools: true
    code-fold: false
    code-copy: true
    self-contained: true
    toc-location: left
knitr: 
    opts_chunk: 
        collapse: TRUE
        dpi: 150
        message: FALSE
        warning: FALSE
        error: TRUE
editor: visual
params:
    pseq_path: pseq_path
    primary_var: primary_var
---


## Load libraries


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(phyloseq)
library(microbiome)
library(ggpubr) # stats with viz
library(patchwork) # combine plots 
```
:::


## Define parameters


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pseq_path = params$pseq_path
primary_var = params$primary_var
```
:::


## Read Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pseq <- readRDS(pseq_path)
## Error in gzfile(file, "rb"): cannot open the connection
```
:::


## Check Reads


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
# add reads/sample to sample_data()
sample_data(pseq)$reads.per.sample <- sample_sums(pseq)
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'otu_table': object 'pseq' not found
# Compare between groups
pseq |> 
    microbiome::meta() |> 
    ggplot(aes_string(primary_var, "reads.per.sample")) +
    geom_violin()+
    geom_boxplot(width=0.2) +
    labs(x="", y="Reads/sample")
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'sample_data': object 'pseq' not found
```
:::


Note here that we have higher reads/sample in L2 group.\

## Alpha diversity


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
# we can add shannon diversity to sample_data(pseq)
sample_data(pseq)$shannon <- microbiome::diversity(pseq, index="shannon")[,1]
## Error in is(x): object 'pseq' not found
sample_data(pseq)$observed <- microbiome::richness(pseq, index="observed")[,1]
## Error in is(x): object 'pseq' not found
p.shannon <- meta(pseq) |> 
    ggplot(aes_string(ILI, "shannon")) +
    geom_violin()+
    geom_boxplot(width=0.2) +
    labs(x="", y="Shannon Diversity")
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'sample_data': object 'pseq' not found
p.observed <- meta(pseq) |> 
    ggplot(aes_string(ILI, "observed")) +
    geom_violin()+
    geom_boxplot(width=0.2) +
    labs(x="", y="Observed ASVs")
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'sample_data': object 'pseq' not found

p.shannon | p.observed
## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'p.shannon' not found
```
:::


## Correlation

Check if reads per sample is correlated to Shannon diversity


::: {.cell layout-align="center"}

```{.r .cell-code}
p.shanon.cor <- meta(pseq) |> 
    ggplot(aes_string("reads.per.sample", "shannon")) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
    ggpubr::stat_cor(method = "spearman", label.y = 2)+
    labs(x="Reads/sample", y="Shannon Diversity")
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'sample_data': object 'pseq' not found
p.observed.cor <- meta(pseq) |> 
    ggplot(aes_string("reads.per.sample", "observed")) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
    ggpubr::stat_cor(method = "spearman", label.y = 2) +
    labs(x="Reads/sample", y="Observed ASVs")
## Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'object' in selecting a method for function 'sample_data': object 'pseq' not found

p.shanon.cor | p.observed.cor
## Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'p.shanon.cor' not found
```
:::
